Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry acknowledged that the rotation would likely tighten as the season progresses but urged his teammates to maintain high energy and set aside personal egos for the team's success.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Golden State Warriors dominated the Utah Jazz in their season opener with a 140-104 victory.
Others: The game will be broadcast live on NBCS-BA and KJZZ, and fans can live stream it on the NBA League Pass and Fubo TV app and website (regional restrictions may apply).
